titles.title: Look around you and see what God has done,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Look around you and see what God has done,
Glowing faces, brand new lives;
The impossible made possible,
Sick and broken made whole,
We're a blessed people of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are conquerors, we're overcomers,
We have power, God's power in our lives.
We have new hope, we have a joy within,
We are precious in God's sight!
